scheme_name: Grant for Construction of Sports Infrastructure
brief_description: The scheme "Grant for Construction of Sports Infrastructure" by the Department of Sports, Government of Uttarakhand, aims to provide financial assistance for building sports facilities. Through this scheme, up to ₹50,00,000/- or 25% of the project cost is granted.
detailed_description: The scheme "Grant for Construction of Sports Infrastructure" by the Department of Sports, Government of Uttarakhand, aims to promote the development of sports infrastructure through financial support. Through this scheme, a grant of up to ₹50,00,000/- or 25% of the total project cost is provided for the construction of sports facilities such as badminton, table tennis, squash, indoor cricket, basketball, volleyball, football, hockey, and swimming. These facilities may also generate employment through operations. <br>
benefits: Financial Support for Construction: Provides a significant grant, covering 25% of the total cost or up to ₹50,00,000/-, for building private sports facilities.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be an individual or private entity willing to construct sports facilities in private areas.

steps: Step 1: The interested applicant should visit the Sports Directorate and request a hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form. Step 2: In the application form, provide all the mandatory details, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attested, if required). Step 3: Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the supporting documents to the Sports Directorate. Step 4: Request a receipt or acknowledgement from the concerned authority to whom the application has been submitted. Note: The application can be submitted at any time as per the convenience of the applicant.

documents_required: Duly Filled Application Form (Offline Mode). Detailed Project Report (DPR) for Sports Infrastructure. Identity Proof of the Applicant (Aadhaar Card/PAN Card). Land Ownership/Lease Documents. Estimated Cost and Budget Plan. Any Other Documents as Required.
